transcontinental_organizations.name: Group of Eight
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: A forum for the governments of eight of the world's largest national economies.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Asia-Europe Foundation
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To promote better mutual understanding and closer cooperation between Asia and Europe.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Central Asian Cooperation Organization
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To enhance regional cooperation and integration among Central Asian states.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Community for Democracy and Rights of Nations
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To foster cooperation between unrecognized or partially recognized states.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Collective Security Treaty Organization
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To provide collective defense for member states.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Conference on Interaction and Confidence Building Measures in Asia
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To enhance cooperation towards promoting peace, security, and stability in Asia.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Commonwealth of Independent States
transcontinental_organizations.members: 12 member states from the Eurasian region
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To foster cooperation in political, economic, and military affairs.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Economic Cooperation Organization
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To establish a single market for goods and services, much like the European Union.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Eurasian Economic Union
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To encourage regional economic integration through the free movement of goods, services, and people within the union.

transcontinental_organizations.name: GUAM Organization for Democracy and Economic Development
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To promote democratic values, ensure stable development, and enhance international and regional security.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Organization of the Black Sea Economic Cooperation
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To foster interaction and harmony among member states in the fields of commerce, economy, science, and technology.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Organization of Turkic States
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To promote comprehensive cooperation among Turkic-speaking states.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Shanghai Cooperation Organisation
transcontinental_organizations.type: Eurasian Political, Economic, and Security Alliance
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To ensure security and maintain stability across the vast Eurasian region.

transcontinental_organizations.name: TRACECA
transcontinental_organizations.members: 14 member states from Eastern Europe, South Caucasus, and Central Asia
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To develop a transport corridor from Europe to China, via the Black Sea, the Caucasus, and Central Asia.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Union State
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To achieve deeper economic integration, including a common currency, and closer political and military cooperation.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Group of Seven
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To discuss and consult on matters of international economic and monetary policy.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Group of Ten
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To coordinate economic and financial policy and lending.

transcontinental_organizations.name: North Atlantic Treaty Organization
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To ensure the freedom and security of its members through political and military means.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To ensure peace, democracy, and stability for more than a billion people in Europe, Asia, and North America.

transcontinental_organizations.name: South Atlantic Peace and Cooperation Zone
transcontinental_organizations.members: 24 member states from Africa and South America
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To promote peace and security in the South Atlantic region.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Union for the Mediterranean
transcontinental_organizations.members: 42 member states from Europe and the Mediterranean Basin
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To enhance regional cooperation and partnership in the Mediterranean region.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Indian Ocean Rim Association for Regional Cooperation
transcontinental_organizations.members: 22 member states bordering the Indian Ocean
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To strengthen regional cooperation and sustainable development within the Indian Ocean region.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Indian Ocean Commission
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To support cooperation in the Indian Ocean region.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Arctic Council
transcontinental_organizations.members: Canada, Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway, Russia, Sweden, United States
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To address issues faced by the Arctic governments and the indigenous people of the Arctic.

transcontinental_organizations.name: ANZUS
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To foster mutual defense and security in the Pacific region.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To promote free trade and economic cooperation throughout the Asia-Pacific region.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Colombo Plan
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To enhance economic and social development in member countries.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Group of Five
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To discuss and communicate their interests on global economic issues.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Melanesian Spearhead Group
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To promote economic growth and trade among Melanesian countries.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Pacific Islands Forum
transcontinental_organizations.members: 18 member states and territories in the Pacific region
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To enhance cooperation and unity among Pacific countries.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Pacific Regional Environment Programme
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To promote cooperation on environmental protection and sustainable development.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Secretariat of the Pacific Community
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To provide development assistance to Pacific countries and territories.

transcontinental_organizations.name: African, Caribbean and Pacific Group of States
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To support sustainable development and poverty reduction within its member states.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Technical Centre for Agricultural and Rural Cooperation ACP-EU
transcontinental_organizations.members: ACP Group of States and the European Union
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To advance food security, resilience, and inclusive economic growth in Africa, the Caribbean, and the Pacific.

transcontinental_organizations.name: Asian-African Legal Consultative Organization
transcontinental_organizations.members: 47 member states from Asia and Africa
transcontinental_organizations.purpose: To serve as an advisory body on matters of international law in Asia and Africa.
